## Description {#details}

This class can be used for tracking most instruction setters.

The two template arguments are:
<ul>
<li>GetterFn: The getter member function pointer (e.g., <code>&amp;Foo::get</code>)</li>
<li>SetterFn: The setter member function pointer (e.g., <code>&amp;Foo::set</code>) Upon construction, it saves a copy of the original value by calling the getter function. Revert sets the value back to the one saved, using the setter function provided.</li>
</ul>


Example: Tracker.track(std::make&#95;unique&lt;
               GenericSetter&lt;&amp;FooInst::get, &amp;FooInst::set&gt;&gt;(I, Tracker));

Definition at line 275 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/tracker-h">Tracker.h</a>.
